_metadata.context: Integrated Framework for Inquiry and Creation
_metadata.purpose: To provide a multi-modal governance system that allows users to toggle between Universal (Accessible) and Expert (Domain-Specific) protocols.

universal_rigorous.name: The Definition Gate

data_schema.identified_anomaly: String (The signal or gap driving the work)

acceptance_criteria: Is the Guiding Question specific enough to guide action but open enough to allow discovery?
Is the need/gap defined by evidence, not just opinion?
Have all critical stakeholders (human and non-human) been identified?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T1 for 'Reframing' if the gap is ill-defined.

universal_rigorous.name: The Constraints Gate
acceptance_criteria: Are the constraints explicit and non-negotiable?
Is the Definition of Done binary (Pass/Fail)?
Does the plan account for the identified level of complexity?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T2 if constraints are ambiguous or resources are insufficient.

universal_rigorous.name: The Options Gate
universal_rigorous.target_tool: T4: Select a Course of Action
acceptance_criteria: Are the options truly distinct (structural variety)?
Do the options address the Gap defined in T1?
Is the risk profile for each option based on data or logic, not just feeling?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T3 if options are variations of a single theme (premature convergence).

universal_rigorous.name: The Baseline Gate
universal_rigorous.source_tool: T4: Select a Course of Action
acceptance_criteria: Is the rationale for rejection of alternatives documented?
Does the selected path logically meet the Success Criteria?
Is the team aligned (Disagree and Commit)?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T4 if the decision logic is weak or consensus is fake.

universal_rigorous.name: The Blueprint Gate
acceptance_criteria: Is the breakdown complete (no orphan components)?
Are the interfaces/connections unambiguous?
Can a stranger execute this plan without asking the author questions?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T5 if the spec contains ambiguity ('TBD').

universal_rigorous.name: The Artifact Gate
acceptance_criteria: Is the artifact stable enough to be reviewed?
Are all known deviations logged?
Is the version clearly identified?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T6 if the artifact is too unstable/incomplete to generate valid feedback.

universal_rigorous.name: The Validation Gate
acceptance_criteria: Are all critical path requirements verified?
Are all open risks formally accepted?
Does the evidence support the claim of readiness?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T7 (or T6) if critical verification fails.

universal_rigorous.name: The Outcome Gate
acceptance_criteria: Was the work formally accepted by the stakeholder/audience?
Is the impact data accurate and complete?
Is the project officially closed?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T8 if acceptance is conditional or ambiguous.

universal_rigorous.name: The Wisdom Gate
acceptance_criteria: Are the principles truly generalizable (not just anecdotes)?
Is the stewardship plan funded/resourced?
Is the playbook accessible to the organization?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Return to T9 if learnings are superficial or not codified.

universal_rigorous.name: The Cycle Gate
acceptance_criteria: Is the system healthy enough to take on new work?
Does the new gap align with the long-term strategy?
Are resources actually available?
universal_rigorous.rejection_policy: Halt new T1 initiation if System Health is critical (Fix the system first).

universal_adaptive.name: The Vision Agreement
definition_of_ready: Is the problem validated by research/observation?
Is the value proposition clear?
Is the scope bounded (what are we NOT doing)?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: If Vision is unclear, trigger a 'Spike' (Research Task) to validate the need.

universal_adaptive.name: The Backlog Refinement
definition_of_ready: Are the top items clear and actionable?
Are dependencies identified?
Is the 'What' clear, leaving the 'How' to the team?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: Unclear items remain in the 'Icebox' and are not pulled into active planning.

universal_adaptive.name: The Cycle Commitment

information_radiator.readiness_check: Is it small enough to finish?

definition_of_ready: Does the item meet the readiness criteria?
Does the team understand the Acceptance Criteria?
Does the team have the skills/tools to execute this now?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: If an item is too big, split it. If it's too vague, return to Vision Holder.

universal_adaptive.name: The Task Breakdown
definition_of_ready: Do we have a shared approach?
Are all sub-tasks identified (drafting, reviewing, polishing)?
Do we believe the Cycle Goal is achievable?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: If the plan exceeds capacity, negotiate scope reduction immediately.

universal_adaptive.name: The Work In Progress (WIP)
definition_of_ready: Is the previous task done?
Are we respecting the WIP limit?
Do I have everything I need to start this specific task?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: Swarm: If an item is blocked, the team pauses new work to unblock it.

universal_adaptive.name: The Integration Check
definition_of_ready: Is the work complete enough to review?
Have basic errors been removed?
Has the work been self-reviewed?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: Stop the Line: If the work is fundamentally broken, fixing it is the top priority.

universal_adaptive.name: The Definition of Done (DoD)
definition_of_ready: Is the item 'Done' according to the DoD? (Reviewed, Polished, Approved)
Is it ready to be shown/used?
Does it meet the Acceptance Criteria?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: If not Done, it is not shown. It returns to the Backlog.

universal_adaptive.name: The Feedback Loop
definition_of_ready: Is the feedback captured?
Is the feedback validated against the vision?
Is it prioritized for the next or future cycles?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: Feedback is not a mandate. Vision Holder decides if it goes into the backlog.

universal_adaptive.name: The Kaizen Agreement
definition_of_ready: Is the improvement specific?
Is it actionable in the very next cycle?
Is there an owner assigned?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: If no improvement is identified, the team is stagnant. Facilitator must provoke.

universal_adaptive.name: The Capacity Check
definition_of_ready: Is the velocity calculation accurate?
Is the team capacity for the next cycle known?
Are we ready to pull from the backlog again?
universal_adaptive.impediment_handling: Adjust scope for the next cycle based on actual capacity, not wishful thinking.
